src:
Samai Torehan Maldini, Ronaldo Kian Dekat dengan Rekor Baru
07 Nov 2019, 06:29 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Cristiano Ronaldo turut tampil saat Juventus menghadapi Lokomotiv Moscow dalam laga lanjutan Liga Champions. Sayangnya, pria berdarah Portugal tersebut tak mampu mencetak gol.
Juventus sendiri berhasil menuai kemenangan dalam laga yang digelar pada Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari tadi. Bermain di markas Lokomotiv Moscow, skuat besutan Maurizio Sarri tersebut menang dengan skor tipis 2-1 berkat gol Aaron Ramsey dan Douglas Costa.
Ronaldo sendiri ditarik keluar lapangan saat pertandingan memasuki menit ke-82. Itu adalah kali pertama pemain berumur 34 tahun tersebut digantikan oleh pemain lain dalam satu pertandingan Juventus. Dalih Sarri, kondisi fisiknya belum 100 persen.
Walaupun demikian, tak ada yang bisa menghalangi Ronaldo untuk membukukan rekor baru. Belum saat ini, namun ada satu rekor yang diyakini bisa dilampaui oleh Ronaldo jika mengingat kualitas fisiknya sekarang.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
Samai nicks Maldini, Ronaldo getting closer to a new record
Nov 7, 2019, 06:29 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Cristiano Ronaldo also appeared when Juventus faced Lokomotiv Moscow in the Champions League continued matches. Unfortunately, the man of Portuguese blood was unable to score a goal.
Juventus itself managed to reap victory in a match that was held on Thursday (11/07/2019) early this morning. Playing at the Lokomotiv Moscow headquarters, the squad made by Maurizio Sarri won by a score of 2-1 thanks to goals from Aaron Ramsey and Douglas Costa.
Ronaldo himself was pulled out of the field when the match entered the 82nd minute. It was the first time the 34-year-old was replaced by another player in a Juventus match. Sarri said, his physical condition was not 100 percent.
However, nothing can prevent Ronaldo from setting a new record. Not yet, but there is one record that is believed to be surpassed by Ronaldo when considering his physical quality now.

Scroll down to read full information.
